byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and NIDA NAJAR
byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka, Bangladesh, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Islamic State was said to have claimed responsibility for the killing of Sanaur Rahman, which followed a string of similar attacks that have accelerated in recent weeks.

headline.main: Doctor Killed in Bangladeshi Machete Attack

snippet: Islamic State was said to have claimed responsibility for the killing of Sanaur Rahman, which followed a string of similar attacks that have accelerated in recent weeks.
